name: Snail Monster Player Controller Demo
description:
This is character called snail Monster player controller demo which you can play in itch.io live in your browser .Its free to play and free to download.

Press W To Move Forward Press S To Move Backwards Press D to Die

You can interact with this model here https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/lowpo... 

The Model is made in Blender and animated in Blender and then demo is developed

 using World Best gaming engine called Unity check Unity here https://unity.com/ For

 any queries contact me at nofilkhan239@gmail.com or nimagin13@gmail.com
